columns.description: Column containing the names of elements. These elements will be counted and the number displayed in each intersection of your Venn diagram. Commonly this will be the Genes column of the output of the "Volcno Plot. -Summary" template.

Column containing the category names. These categories will be used to draw the circles of your Venn diagram. Commonly, this will be your Contrasts column from the output of the "Volcano Plot - Summary" template.

description:
Template generates Venn diagram of intersections across a series of sets (e.g., intersections of significant genes across tested contrasts).
This Venn diagram is available for up to five sets; Intersection plot is available for any number of sets. Specific sets can be selected for the visualizations and the returned dataset may include all (default) or specified intersections.

inputDatasets.description: The input dataset containing cateogry membership information. Should contain at least two columns: elements and categories. If an element is contained in multiple categories, there should be one row for each category.

parameters.description: If no categories are listed then all available categories will be used; if a single category is listed only Venn diagram or Intersection table can be plotted; if more than 5 categories are listed only Intersection plot or Intersection table can be plotted

Enter Intersection id(s); the intersection id displayed in the Logs tab after the first run of the template or in the Intersection table if selected as the option of the Plot selection parameter above; if none entered, all intersections are returned
If TRUE, count each element in a given category only once (ignore duplicate entries)
The format that the numbers will be printed in
The number of significant digits in percent values
The colour of each circle's interior. The number of colors you choose should be  at least the number of input datasets.
The transparency of each circle's interior. Enter a value between 0 and 1 (from transparent to opaque)
The colour of each circle's circumference; if the option 'fill colors' is chosen the same as "Colors: fill" above

parameters.displayName: Venn Font Size for Category Names
parameters.description: The font size for each category name

A numeric vector giving the distance of each category name from the edge of the circle (can be negative); the default values are between 0.025 - 0.22; adjusting both the distance and position (below) may be optimal.
A numeric vector giving the position (in degrees) of each category name along the circle, with 0 at 12 o'clock; adjusting both the position and distance (above) may be optimal.
The font size for each area label
The amount of whitespace around the diagram in grid units; recommended values are between 0.05 - 0.2; adding more space can help fit the category names.
The intersections ordering; the options include degree and freq (frequency)
If FALSE (default) empty sets are not plotted
Select the image format for saved images: currently only .png available

title: Venn Diagram [CCBR]
